alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Grundy; Putnam; Van Buren; Warren; White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:11PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of De Kalb, Van Buren, Warren, northern Grundy, White and southwestern Putnam Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 510 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Smithville to 8 miles north of McMinnville to 15 miles northwest of Gruetli-Laager. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cookeville, McMinnville, Sparta, Smithville, Spencer, Altamont, Doyle, Beersheba Springs, Viola, Hamptons Crossroads, Bakers Crossroads, Virgin Falls State Natural Area, Burgess Falls State Park, Rock Island State Park, Center Hill Lake, Fall Creek Falls State Park and Edgar Evans State Park. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 270 and 277, and between mile markers 296 and 297. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for Middle Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: De Kalb; Grundy; Putnam; Van Buren; Warren; White
